name: cherrystone
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small size of clam (= a sea creature with a shell in two parts and a soft body that can be eaten): The fried clams were whole fried cherrystones. steamed cherrystone clams with rice wine vinegar and dill
More examplesFewer examplesCherrystones, littlenecks, topnecks, and chowders are the common market names for the various sizes of hardshell clams.I had cherrystone clams for my starter and they were fresh and delicious. Cherrystones, if they’re good-quality ones, are the closest you can get here to European clams.
